title: Riot does love me

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: I've recently started maining Thresh as I'm a support main and I got a key frag from an aram match. I decided to test my luck and crafted the key and opened up a chest. My jaw dropped so hard that it almost broke the desk. Time to reform so I can keep this beauty.

replies.body: lucky bastard, all i get are champions or skins i already own
I've gotten a couple skins I like, while my friend who's been playing since Season 2 (That's when he said he started) only gets champ shards.

You sir, (or ma'am) are hella lucky! 

Go reap the stars from the sky, and spread your cosmic horror!
(Spooky noises!!!!!)
I'm not spending money on this game and I still need 1.1k orange essence to unlock it.
